pkgmetadata.longdescription: Flexible Scan Statistics // An easy way to conduct flexible scan. Monte-Carlo method is used to test the spatial clusters given the cases, population, and shapefile. A table with formal style and a map with clusters are included in the result report. The method can be referenced at: Toshiro Tango and Kunihiko Takahashi (2005) doi:10.1186/1476-072X-4-11.
